org.jlab.mya

Class QueryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.mya.QueryService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntervalService, PointService, SamplingService

    public abstract class QueryService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides query access to the Mya database. This class is abstract because it simply sets up the framework for specialized services to do the heavy lifting. This base class houses the DataNexus and Metadata lookup, both of which are required for any specialized query service to function.
    Author:
    slominskir

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DataNexus nexus
      The DataNexus, which is the gateway to querying a Mya cluster.
